examples: una persona de inteligencia alta / media / baja
He didn't even have the intelligence to call for an ambulance.
Ni siquiera tenía la inteligencia para llamar a una ambulancia.
As a director, he tends to underestimate the intelligence of his audience.
Como director, tiende a subestimar la inteligencia de su audiencia.
Please don't insult my intelligence by lying to me.
Por favor, no insultes mi inteligencia mintiéndome.
